Mayor & Commission

Our MissionOur mission is to identify, procure, implement and support the highest values and services for the City of Pampa, its citizens and employees. We are committed to being responsible stewards of the resources entrusted to us by the Citizens of Pampa.  We are committed to being the most livable City in the Panhandle by providing quality products and services.


Mike Borger - Mayor
Wendi Horst - Ward 1
   

Brian Doughty - Ward 2		 Jimmy Keough - Ward 3
   

Jimmy Reed - Ward 4

Contact InformationDirections
